select ri.id, ri.user_id, ri.price, ri.register_date, ri.dept_id, ri.staff_id, ri.start_date, ri.end_date, ri.status, ri.pay_date, ri.file, ri.remark, ri.code, ri.drug_price, ri.reference, ri.create_date, ri.schedule_id, oi.offices_name, hi.hospital_name, hi.images as hospitalImages, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address as userAddress, di.doctor_name, di.images from register_info ri left join office_info oi on (oi.id = ri.dept_id) left join hospital_info hi on (hi.id = oi.hospital_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ri.user_id) left join doctor_info di on (di.id = ri.staff_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{registerInfo.userName},'%')
AND hi.hospital_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{registerInfo.hospitalName},'%')
AND oi.offices_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{registerInfo.officesName},'%')
AND ri.status = #{registerInfo.status}
AND hi.user_id = #{registerInfo.hospitalId}
order by ri.create_date desc

select oi.id, oi.user_id, oi.price, oi.register_date, oi.dept_id, oi.staff_id, oi.start_date, oi.end_date, oi.status, oi.pay_date, oi.file, oi.remark, oi.code, oi.drug_price, oi.reference, oi.create_date, oi.schedule_id from register_info oi where DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
